name: launch_organic_coffee_brand
description: Tests campaign creation for a new organic coffee brand targeting Gen Z.
user_message: I want to launch a marketing campaign for a new organic coffee brand targeting Gen Z. My budget is $20,000 and the timeline is 2 months. I want to use Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

name: b2b_lead_generation_no_budget
description: Tests campaign creation for B2B lead generation with no specified budget.
user_message: Create a B2B lead generation campaign for my SaaS product. Target audience is marketing managers and small business owners. Use LinkedIn, Email, and Content Marketing. Timeline is 3 months.

name: ecommerce_holiday_sale_campaign
description: Tests campaign creation for an e-commerce holiday sale campaign.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign for a holiday sale for my e-commerce store. My target audience is families and young adults. Budget is $50,000, timeline is 1 month. Use Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads.

name: local_restaurant_promotion
description: Tests campaign creation for a local restaurant promotion.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to promote my local restaurant. Target audience is people within a 5-mile radius. Budget is $5,000, timeline is 2 weeks. Use Facebook, Instagram, and local newspapers.

name: mobile_app_download_campaign
description: Tests campaign creation for a mobile app download campaign.
user_message: Create a marketing campaign to increase downloads of my mobile app. Target audience is tech-savvy millennials. Budget is $10,000, timeline is 1 month. Use Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and influencer marketing.

name: nonprofit_donation_drive
description: Tests campaign creation for a nonprofit donation drive.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign for a donation drive for my nonprofit organization. Target audience is socially conscious individuals. Budget is $2,000, timeline is 1 month. Use email marketing, social media, and local events.

name: new_book_launch
description: Tests campaign creation for a new book launch.
user_message: I want to launch a marketing campaign for my new book. Target audience is young adults interested in fantasy novels. Budget is $3,000, timeline is 2 months. Use social media, book blogs, and online advertising.

name: real_estate_listing_promotion
description: Tests campaign creation for promoting a real estate listing.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to promote a real estate listing. Target audience is families looking to buy a new home. Budget is $1,000, timeline is 2 weeks. Use online advertising, social media, and local newspapers.

name: music_album_release
description: Tests campaign creation for a new music album release.
user_message: Create a marketing campaign for my new music album. Target audience is fans of alternative rock. Budget is $5,000, timeline is 3 months. Use social media, music blogs, and online streaming platforms.

name: political_campaign_awareness
description: Tests campaign creation for a political campaign to increase awareness.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to increase awareness for my political campaign. Target audience is voters aged 18-35. Budget is $10,000, timeline is 2 months. Use social media, online advertising, and local events.

name: gym_membership_promotion
description: Tests campaign creation for promoting gym memberships.
user_message: Create a marketing campaign to promote gym memberships. Target audience is adults aged 25-55 interested in fitness. Budget is $3,000, timeline is 1 month. Use social media, local advertising, and email marketing.

name: software_update_announcement
description: Tests campaign creation for announcing a software update.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to announce a new software update. Target audience is existing users of the software. Budget is $500, timeline is 1 week. Use email marketing, in-app notifications, and social media.

name: university_open_day_promotion
description: Tests campaign creation for promoting a university open day.
user_message: Create a marketing campaign to promote a university open day. Target audience is prospective students aged 17-18. Budget is $2,000, timeline is 2 months. Use social media, online advertising, and school visits.

name: charity_event_fundraising
description: Tests campaign creation for fundraising for a charity event.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign to raise funds for a charity event. Target audience is local community members. Budget is $1,000, timeline is 1 month. Use social media, local newspapers, and email marketing.

name: unclear_objective_no_channels
description: Tests campaign creation with an unclear objective and no specified channels.
user_message: I need a marketing campaign. My target audience is everyone. Budget is $100,000, timeline is 1 year.
